original_text: So Jeremiah started to leave Jerusalem. He wanted to go to the land that belonged to Benjamin's tribe. He wanted to receive his part of the land that belonged to his family.
korean_text: 예레미야가 베냐민 땅에서 백성 가운데 분깃을 받으려고 예루살렘을 떠나 그리로 가려 하여

sentences.original_text: So Jeremiah started to leave Jerusalem.
He wanted to go to the land
He wanted to receive his part of the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 땅 몫을 받고 싶어했습니다.
